E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/8/1973
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Ron Fairly



Date: Sunday, 5/12/1973
Subject: Progress of John Hart
Dear Sir,
John Hart has nothing more to prove at A Appleton Foxes!
He has an AVG of .288 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
